title: The mystery of chronic pain
description: We think of pain as a symptom, but there are cases where the nervous system develops feedback loops and pain becomes a terrifying disease in itself. Starting with the story of a girl whose sprained wrist turned into a nightmare, Elliot Krane talks about the complex mystery of chronic pain, and reviews the facts we're just learning about how it works and how to treat it.
author: Elliot Krane
keywords: TED, talks, Senses, brain, health, health care, pain, science
